name: UPCYCLED CIGAR BOX
description:
Need a place to store all those little memories, trinkets from years gone by. Here is an upcycled cigar box you can do that with. I have covered the box with a special paper of orange hues and embellished with different types of ephemera, metals, lace ribbon, even a knob you can use to open it. Inside it is lined with burlap, and I even left the inside cover uncovered so you could see the cigar maker. 
I have put a mini journal inside so you can start writing about all those memories. 
You can also use this box as a jewelry box if you would like.

name: LETS GO TO THE BEACH
description:
Time for that beach vacation. It's that time of the year when everyone heads to cooler waters, why not take a journal along to record all those fantastic memories. In the front of the journal is a pocket to put all those maps to the fun places you want to explore farther down is another pocket I have put journaling tags if you do not want to take the journal you can just take the tags to record those moments and then transfer into journal when you get back.
Attached are 2 bookmarks with trinkets attached. Also, there is a pocket for snapshots to tuck into to help you return to those fun times when you are reading your journal after that fantastic vacation is over. Thru out are embelishments to help you relate to that time you walked on the beach in your flip flops or had that great drink at the bar. 

Size is 7 1/2" x 6 1/2"

"LET'S GO TO THE BEACH"

name: HOW DO I LOVE THEE, LET ME COUNT THE WAYS
description:
Ever have a secret crush on someone and wanted to put it down in words?? Or how about writing about that "Love of your Life" and letting her/him read about it. This journal is the perfect way to do that. Spiral bound with butterfly stamps, small inspiration stickers thru out. Attached are 3 bookmarks with trinkets, a stone from a river in Tennesse and a journal tag to use to go right back to that page you were writing those loving thoughts on. Also, in the back I have included some extra journal tags to use when a beautiful thought comes to mind you can write on when you don't have your journal with you. 
This journal would also be a great gift for a newly engaged bride or groom to use leading up to their special day, writing down all those special thoughts then presenting to each other as a gift.

This journal is 8 3/4" x 6" with 150 pages to write on.

A beautiful love letter to your bride or groom.

name: WHO LET THE DOGS OUT?
description:
Cute little journal that can be used as a travel journal or an everyday journal to jot thoughts into. I have covered this journal with a paper that has different types of dogs on it and added trinkets, cards, a tiny ruler and a small envelope. Inside is 60/120 lined pages just waiting for you to start recording your thoughts. On the back inside cover is an envelope with different post cards to send or use as additional areas to write. 
The journal has a ribbon tied around to keep all those thoughts safely tucked away

name: BABY GIRL JOURNAL
description: You're having a baby, CONGRATULATIONS and it's a girl, WOW!!!! Here's the perfect planning journal for that beautiful day. It starts with your doctor visits, then nursery planning on to the shower and then that beautiful day, her birth. The journal includes several pages for each section and many more after the birth to use for her doctor visits, milestones in her growing years, etc. Also included are 3 bookmarks with trinkets attached to keep track of where you are 150 pages and a ribbon to keep all your writing secure.

name: FABULOUS GIFT BOX
description:
You give your gift to someone and they are sure to ask where did you get this beautiful box? It is oval shaped with the bottom finished with a French inspired paper and pearls. The cover is also finished with French inspired paper with a bird attached. On the cover there are feathers, ribbon and a flower. 
Who wouldn't want a gift in this box??

name: ALTERNATIVE TO THE ORDINARY GUEST BOOK
description:
Do you dare to be different? Have you thought there's got to be a different way my guests can wish us "Best Wishes" for our future as a married couple?
Here it is a Guest Book suit case. I custom the case to what you want, all Tags, all Cards, all note paper, how about post cards. Or it can be a mix of all the above. The cards, tags, and post cards are embellished with ribbons, feathers, lace, gems, etc and then antiqued inked on the edges and left blank on the backside for the guests to write their notes. The note paper is antiqued inked on the edges and stamped, if you want, with special sayings. I also include a banner letting your guests know this is where they would sign their names and write a special note to the Bride and Groom.
These guest suitcases are great for outdoor weddings, country or maybe that vintage wedding you always wanted.
*** In your convo state how many cards, tags, papers, you will need or any details I will need to know. *** *** Or any questions you may have. ***
The pictured Guest Book is a sample of what yours could look like, "Parisien Theme". The price of the pictured Guest Book is for 75 guests. After the wedding it becomes a "Keepsake Item" for the bride and groom.
As I always say: "LET'S TALK"

name: STEAMPUNK JOURNAL
description: This journal is a small 80 page gold tone Steampunk style. It is small enough to keep in your purse, book bag, etc. to have at anytime to write your thoughts in. I have created this with gold tone papers, steampunk flower, lace and jeweled buckle on the front and back.

name: ARTISIT SKETCH BOOK MEMORY KEEPER
description:
Do you like to draw? Is there times you see something and you want to do a sketch of it and don't have anything to sketch it on. Here is a sketch book you can carry in you purse, book bag, backpack, etc. to have ready any time. It has over a hundred blank pages to create your sketch on or even to write some memories of a place you have been.
On the back and half the front I have attached a very thinly cut piece of wood to give it that rugged feeling. Also I have attached 2 bookmarks to keep your place.

name: LET'S GO WINE TASTING
description:
For those Wine Enthusiasts that like to explore different wines. Here is a journal to record all those different types you taste. The journal is 10 x 71/2 with 150 lined pages, 300 using both sides and it is made out of moleskin. It is big enough to include the label from the wine bottle on the pages so you will know who produced it, what brand, if it is red or white, etc. Thoughout the journal are embelishments of grapes, wine glasses, wine bottles, etc. I have included a scoring guide with a lined envelope to write down the wineries you would like to attend in the front and in the back is a envelope with tags to take with you, if you don't want to take the whole journal, to record your thoughts on then transfer into the journal later. On some of the tags are suggestions how to score the wine.

Also included is 3 bookmarks with trinkets attached and a lovely ribbon to wrap the journal up to keep everything in tact

name: LET OUT YOUR INNER PRINCESS
description:
Are you a "Princess" that nobody understands? Do you really care what they think? Or do you just like leopard spots?? This is a fun journal with over a hundred pages to use to write your inner most feelings, place special photos or what ever you want in. Thru the journal are inspirational messages and I have included 2 book marks to keep your place.
I have tied it up with a leopard spotted ribbon and a jeweled buckle.

name: MY BOOK
description:
Is your child getting old enough to keep a diary? Here is a beginning journal for that young lady to begin recording her feelings, her secret crushes, or her everyday life happenings. It's small enough to tuck into her book bag or a drawer or under her pillow.

"DO YOU THINK HE LIKES ME"
